mapper.insert: insert into qo_order_info (order_id, saleDate, goods_id, goods_count, total_price, uid, phone, tips, status, create_time, modified_time) values (#{order_id},#{saleDate},#{goods_id},#{goods_count},#{total_price},#{uid},#{phone},#{tips},#{status},#{create_time},#{modified_time});
mapper.select: select * from qo_order_info qoi where (unix_timestamp(now())-60*5) > unix_timestamp(qoi.create_time) and qoi.status = 0;
mapper.update: update qo_order_info set status = #{status}, modified_time = current_timestamp where order_id = #{order_id};
